Headline: #26 South Shore Express & #30 South Chicago Temporary Reroute at Ewing/95th
ShortDescription: 26 South Shore Express & 30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Ewing, 95th, Ave L, 100th & Ewing, due to street blockage near Ewing/95th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#26 South Shore Express & #30 South Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ewing, 95th, Ave L, 100th & Ewing, due to street blockage near Ewing/95th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute near 79th/Coles
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses temp. rerouted Northbound: South Shore and 71st; Southbound: Exchange, 76th and South Shore due to, street blockage near 79th/Coles.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 79th/Coles due to street blockage near 79th/Coles.

Northbound buses will operate via South Shore and 71st including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via Exchange, 76th and South Shore.

Allow extra travel time.
